verses.verse: Then we <S%H6437>turned,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1316>Bashan:<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us, <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> him <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and his <S%H776>land,<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> unto him <S%H834>as<s%> thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people:<s%> and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> him <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1115>none<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> to him <S%H8300>remaining.<s%>

And we <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H7151>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> them, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob,<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H1219>fenced<s%> with <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2346>walls,<s%> <S%H1817>gates,<s%> and <S%H1280>bars;<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H6521>unwalled<s%> <S%H4480>towns<s%> <S%H5892><s%> a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7235>many.<s%>

And we utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, <S%H834>as<s%> we <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> utterly <S%H2763>destroying<s%> the <S%H4962>men,<s%> <S%H802>women,<s%> and <S%H2945>children,<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>
But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities,<s%> we took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> to ourselves.

And we <S%H3947>took<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> from the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5158><s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon;<s%>
(Which <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H8303>Sirion;<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> it <S%H8149>Shenir;)<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H5548>Salchah<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei,<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H4480>remnant<s%> <S%H3499><s%> of <S%H7497>giants;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H6210>bedstead<s%> was a <S%H6210>bedstead<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%> is <S%H1931>it<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H7237>Rabbath<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon?<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it, after the <S%H520>cubit<s%> of a <S%H376>man.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> which we <S%H3423>possessed<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> from <S%H4480>Aroer,<s%> <S%H6177><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, <S%H5414>gave<s%> I unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites.<s%>

And the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> being the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og,<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> I unto the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>giants.<s%>

Jair <S%H2971><s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2256>country<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H1651>Geshuri<s%> and <S%H4602>Maachathi;<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> them <S%H5921>after<s%> his own <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1316>Bashan-havoth-jair,<s%> <S%H2334><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> unto <S%H4353>Machir.<s%>

And unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and unto the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%> <S%H8432>half<s%> the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> which is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

The <S%H6160>plain<s%> also, and <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H1366>coast<s%> thereof, from <S%H4480>Chinnereth<s%> <S%H3672><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain,<s%> even the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H798>Ashdoth-pisgah<s%> <S%H6449><s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it: ye shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that are meet for the <S%H1121>war.<s%> <S%H2438><s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and your <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> (for I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye have <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle,)<s%> shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you;

Until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto your <S%H251>brethren,<s%> as well as unto you, and until <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> them <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> and then shall ye <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H3425>possession,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H5674>passest.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you.
And I <S%H2603>besought<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1433>greatness,<s%> and thy <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is there in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> or in <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> according to thy <S%H4639>works,<s%> and according to thy <S%H1369>might?<s%>

I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let me go <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with me for your <S%H4616>sakes,<s%> and would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H413><s%> me: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> thee; <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>matter.<s%>

Get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah,<s%> and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H8486>southward,<s%> and <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> it with thine <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

But <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H2388>encourage<s%> him, and <S%H553>strengthen<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall cause them to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H7200>see.<s%>
So we <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1047>Beth-peor.<s%>
